purpose: Victoria basketball clubs - NBL1 South expansion targets

leads.personalizationAnchor: Oldest basketball association in Australia. Competes across VJBL, Big V, and NBL1 South. Multiple team levels = data tracking challenge.
leads.draftedIntro:
Hi there,

Melbourne Tigers' legacy in Australian basketball is legendary — managing teams across VJBL, Big V, and NBL1 South is no small feat.

I'm Michael from CourtLab, an Adelaide startup built for basketball clubs. We help organizations with multiple team levels track verified player data across the board — no more spreadsheets juggling stats from different competitions.

With your scale and prestige, having one unified platform for player development, stats, and film could set you apart in an increasingly tech-forward landscape.

Worth exploring? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
leads.nextAction: Get contact email + send personalized outreach
leads.notes: Historic club, Melbourne CBD location, 5,492 Facebook followers, VJBL/Big V/NBL1 presence

leads.personalizationAnchor: Elite NBL1 South program competing for national championships. High-performance focus = data-driven culture likely.
leads.draftedIntro:
Hi Nunawading,

Your NBL1 South program competes at the national championship level — that means elite-level player development and scouting.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We help high-performance basketball programs track verified player data that actually stands up to scrutiny. Shooting stats, combine times, development progress — all documented and portable.

For a club competing nationally, having verified data that follows players through their development journey could be a recruiting advantage.

Worth a conversation? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
leads.notes: Elite program, national championship competitor, high-performance focus

leads.personalizationAnchor: 6 teams in VJBL VC (Victoria's top tier). Strongest junior program in Melbourne's east. Big development pipeline.
leads.draftedIntro:
Hi Waverley Falcons,

Six teams in VJBL VC is elite company — you're Melbourne's eastern powerhouse for junior development.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. With that many teams across skill levels, tracking player development consistently becomes critical. Shooting stats, progress tracking, film library — all in one place.

Given your pipeline focus, verified data that travels with players from U12s through elite could be valuable for recruitment and retention.

Worth exploring? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
leads.notes: 6 teams in VJBL VC, elite junior program, strongest east Melbourne

leads.personalizationAnchor: Regional growth hub for basketball in outer Geelong. Strong youth participation, building NBL1 South competitive pathway from grassroots. Gateway region for talent development.
leads.draftedIntro:
Hi Geelong Superstars,

Geelong's becoming a real basketball hotbed — you've got youth participation growing and you're building a competitive NBL1 South pathway. That's great positioning.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. Regional clubs like yours that manage grassroots + competitive pathways benefit most from unified player development tracking. You can show talent progression from U10 all the way to NBL1.

Given Geelong's growth and your gateway position to developing players, having verified data on player improvement could strengthen recruitment and player retention.

Worth exploring? courtlab.app | https://apps.apple.com/us/app/courtlab-basketball-trainer/id6757304855

Cheers,
Michael
leads.notes: Regional growth hub, grassroots-to-competitive pathway, outer Geelong, strong youth participation, NBL1 building

research_status.next_phase: Get contact emails + map remaining 12 clubs (Tasmania + SA-based NBL1 South clubs)
